article_title: Ads Score Big At Super Bowl And At Tax Time, Too

article_metadata.description: It's the Super Bowl. You're watching for the football, right? Over a quarter of those tuned in do so to watch the commercials. That's good news for advertisers - and lucky for them, they can take a tax deduction for the expense. But you don't have to be a Super Bowl advertiser to claim promotional and advertising expenses.
article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb
